document.full_text: targets of pervasive chinese cyber attacks hope the latest breach of google email will spark a robust u.s. response but washington may find it hard to pin precise blame on china and cannot go too far against a key economic and diplomatic partner.
document.title: analysis: can naming, shaming curb cyber attacks from china?
lines_and_colors: targets of pervasive chinese cyber attacks hope the latest breach of google email will spark a robust u.s. response but washington may find it hard to pin precise blame on china and cannot go too far against a key economic and diplomatic partner.
